mapper.insert: insert into userinfo(user_id, user_name, user_pwd, user_email, user_phone, user_date, is_delete) values (#{userId}, #{userName}, #{userPwd}, #{userEmail}, #{userPhone}, #{userDate}, #{isDelete})
mapper.select: select ifnull(count(1),0) from userinfo where is_delete ='0'
select user_id,user_name,user_pwd,user_phone,user_email,user_date,is_delete from userinfo where is_delete = '0' order by user_date desc
